title: AI-Driven Real-Time Interactive Analysis in Science Instruction Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Analyzing interaction data via AI tools in real-time video conferencing environments, applied to science experiments and discussion activities

learning_goals: Learners can measure student-instructor and student-student interaction ratios during online classes with 85% accuracy using AI analysis tools
Learners can interpret interaction data to identify non-participatory segments in class and suggest three or more improvement strategies
Learners can optimize the design of science laboratory lessons by utilizing analysis results categorized by interaction types (student-instructor/student-student/student-object/no interaction).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
